accountID.description: The financial organisation’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.

lisaManagerReferenceNumber.description: The number issued to the provider when they register with HMRC for LISA.

creationReason.description: The reason the account was created

firstSubscriptionDate.description: The date of the first deposit into the account - if this is a transfer, use the date of deposit into the account managed by the previous organisation.

transferAccount.description: If the accountCreationReason is ‘Transferred’, then this is required.

transferredFromAccountID.description: The previous financial organisation’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.

transferredFromLMRN.description: The number issued to the previous LISA provider when they registered with HMRC for LISA.

transferInDate.description: The date the account transferred from the previous provider to the new one.
